title: *UPCOMING 2X2 APT UPSTAIRS! FULLY RENOVATED WITH W/D INCLUDED! CALL RN
posting_body: ['Everything You Need, All Right Here', 'CALL:', 'show contact info', 'x685', 'From $1,720', '.', '2 Bed 2 Bath .', '888 Sq.Ft', '* Unit 625 - Available 09/23/22', '* Unit 425 - Available 09/28/22', '* Unit 721 - Available 10/07/22', 'The Lido Apartments', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Address:', '2501 Wigwam Parkway Henderson, NV 89074', 'Want more information?', '<URL>', 'show contact info', '/floorplan/8530685/1?extnId=9612603', 'DESCRIPTION', 'This two-bedroom, two-bathroom model offered at The Lido has a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and a separate dining area.', 'The home includes a full-size washer and dryer, a walk-in closet, and hardwood floors.', 'The interior comes installed with air conditioning and ceiling fans as well.', 'The community welcomes individuals 55+ and accommodates pets.', 'The Lido offers access to several on-site amenities.', 'Residents can visit the pool and therapeutic hot tub to unwind or use the equipment in the fitness center to stay active.', 'The community also facilitates social events and offers spaces to mingle with neighbors such as a clubhouse and outdoor seating areas.', 'Its location brings residents closer to nearby entertainment venues and leisure spots such as Legacy Golf Club and Green Valley Ranch Resort Spa & Casino.', 'Call the leasing office today for more information.', 'FLOORPLAN SPECIALS', 'Now Offering $500.00 Off When You Lease A One Bedroom Home | Restrictions Apply | Call For Details', 'FLOORPLAN/UNIT\u2002 \u2002FEATURES', 'Air Conditioning', 'Heat', 'Ceiling Fan', 'Washer', 'Dryer', 'Refrigerator', 'Dishwasher', 'Range', 'Microwave', 'Cable', 'Carport', 'Disposal', 'Handrails', 'Large Closets', 'Hardwood Flooring', 'Tile Flooring', 'Window Coverings', 'LEASE\u2002\u2002TERMS', '6,7,8,9,10,11,12,13', 'Online Leasing URL:', '<URL>', 'OFFICE\u2002 \u2002HOURS', 'Monday', '8:00am to 5:00pm', 'Tuesday', '8:00am to 5:00pm', 'Wednesday', '8:00am to 5:00pm', 'Thursday', '8:00am to 5:00pm', 'Friday', '8:00am to 5:00pm', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x685', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
